00014 #ifndef VMIMMC_H
00015 #define VMIMMC_H
00016 
00017 // VMI area includes
00018 #include "vmi/vmiCommand.h"
00019 #include "vmi/vmiTypes.h"
00020 
00021 
00022 //
00023 // Return the component name
00024 //
00025 const char *vmimmcGetName(vmimmcComponentP component);
00026 
00027 //
00028 // Return the component full hierarchical name
00029 //
00030 const char *vmimmcGetHierarchicalName(vmimmcComponentP component);
00031 
00032 //
00033 // Get the next slave port connected to the named component output port (for
00034 // TRANSPARENT MMC models)
00035 //
00036 vmimmcPortP vmimmcGetNextPort(vmimmcComponentP component, const char *portName);
00037 
00038 //
00039 // Get the domain for the named component output port (for FULL MMC models)
00040 //
00041 memDomainP vmimmcGetNextDomain(vmimmcComponentP component, const char *portName);
00042 
00043 //
00044 // Return attributes for a port
00045 //
00046 vmimmcAttrCP vmimmcGetPortAttrs(vmimmcPortP port);
00047 
00048 //
00049 // Refresh a subsequent transparent MMC model
00050 //
00051 void vmimmcRefreshTransparent(vmimmcPortP nextPort, vmiIASRunState state);
00052 
00053 //
00054 // Refresh a subsequent full MMC model
00055 //
00056 void vmimmcRefreshFull(memDomainP nextDomain, vmiIASRunState state);
00057 
00058 //
00059 // Add a command for the passed component
00060 //
00061 vmiCommandP vmimmcAddCommand(
00062     vmimmcComponentP component,
00063     const char      *name,
00064     const char      *exampleArguments,
00065     vmimmcCommandFn  commandCB,
00066     vmiCommandAttrs  attrs
00067 );
00068 
00069 //
00070 // Add a command with command parser for the passed component
00071 // Do not use this function.
00072 //
00073 vmiCommandP vmimmcAddCommandParse(
00074     vmimmcComponentP     component,
00075     const char          *name,
00076     const char          *exampleArguments,
00077     vmimmcCommandParseFn commandCB,
00078     vmiCommandAttrs      attrs
00079 );
